data.name: MSSignCommandCertificateFileDescription
data.value: File path to the p7b file to be used while signing the package.

data.name: MSSignCommandCertificateFingerprintDescription
data.value: SHA-256, SHA-384 or SHA-512 fingerprint of the certificate used to search a p7b file for the certificate.

data.name: MSSignCommandCSPNameDescription
data.value: Name of the cryptographic service provider which contains the private key container.

data.name: MSSignCommandDescription
data.value: Signs a NuGet package with the specified p7b file.

data.name: MSSignCommandHashAlgorithmDescription
data.value: Hash algorithm to be used while generating the package manifest file. Defaults to SHA256.

data.name: MSSignCommandInvalidArgumentException
data.value: Invalid value provided for '{0}'. For a list of accepted values, please visit https://learn.microsoft.com/nuget/reference/cli-reference/cli-ref-sign

data.name: MSSignCommandInvalidCngKeyException
data.value: Cng Key is not an RSA key.

data.name: MSSignCommandKeyContainerDescription
data.value: Name of the key container which has the private key.

data.name: MSSignCommandNoCertException
data.value: Can't find specified certificate.

data.name: MSSignCommandNoCngKeyException
data.value: Can't find cng key.

data.name: MSSignCommandNoPackageException
data.value: No package was provided. For a list of accepted ways to provide a package, please visit https://docs.nuget.org/docs/reference/command-line-reference

data.name: MSSignCommandNoTimestamperWarning
data.value: No '-Timestamper' option was provided the signed package will not be timestamped. To learn more about this option, please visit https://docs.nuget.org/docs/reference/command-line-reference

data.name: MSSignCommandNoValidCertificateFileException
data.value: No CertificateFile provided or provided file is not a p7b file.

data.name: MSSignCommandOutputDirectoryDescription
data.value: Directory where the signed package should be saved. By default the original package is overwritten by the signed package.

data.name: MSSignCommandTimestamperDescription
data.value: URL to an RFC 3161 timestamping server.

data.name: MSSignCommandTimestampHashAlgorithmDescription
data.value: Hash algorithm to be used by the RFC 3161 timestamp server. Defaults to SHA256.

data.name: MSSignCommandUsageDescription
data.value: Signs a NuGet package.

data.name: MSSignCommandUsageExamples
data.value:
nuget mssign MyPackage.nupkg -Timestamper https://foo.bar -CertificateFile foo.p7b -CSPName "Cryptographic Service Provider" -KeyContainer "4003d786-cc37-4004-bfdf-c4f3e8ef9b3a" -CertificateFingerprint "4003d786cc374004bfdfc4f3e8ef9b3a"
nuget mssign MyPackage.nupkg -Timestamper https://foo.bar -CertificateFile foo.p7b -CSPName "Cryptographic Service Provider" -KeyContainer "4003d786-cc37-4004-bfdf-c4f3e8ef9b3a" -CertificateFingerprint "4003d786cc374004bfdfc4f3e8ef9b3a" -OutputDirectory .\..\Signed

data.name: MSSignCommandUsageSummary
data.value: <package_path> -Timestamper <timestamp_server_url> -CertificateFile <p7b_file_path> -CSPName <cryptographic_service _provider_name> -KeyContainer <key_container_guid> -CertificateFingerprint <certificate_fingerprint>

data.name: MSSignCommandOverwriteDescription
data.value: Switch to indicate if the current signature should be overwritten. By default the command will fail if the package already has a signature.

data.name: RepoSignCommandDescription
data.value: Sign a NuGet package by adding repository signature with specified p7b file.

data.name: RepoSignCommandPackageOwnersDescription
data.value: Semicolon-separated list of package owners.

data.name: RepoSignCommandUsageDescription
data.value: Sign a NuGet package with repository signature.

data.name: RepoSignCommandUsageExamples
data.value:
nuget reposign MyPackage.nupkg -Timestamper http://timestamper.test -CertificateFile certificates.p7b -CSPName "Cryptographic Service Provider" -KeyContainer 4003d786-cc37-4004-bfdf-c4f3e8ef9b3a -CertificateFingerprint 8599ADD1C62EE42E315EA887FF60908B7A7C6E9B -V3ServiceIndexUrl https://v3.index.test
nuget reposign MyPackage.nupkg -Timestamper http://timestamper.test -CertificateFile certificates.p7b -CSPName "Cryptographic Service Provider" -KeyContainer 4003d786-cc37-4004-bfdf-c4f3e8ef9b3a -CertificateFingerprint 8599ADD1C62EE42E315EA887FF60908B7A7C6E9B -OutputDirectory .\..\Signed -PackageOwners "owner1;owner2" -V3ServiceIndexUrl https://v3.index.test

data.name: RepoSignCommandUsageSummary
data.value: <package_path> -Timestamper <timestamp_server_url> -CertificateFile <p7b_file_path> -CSPName <cryptographic_service_provider_name> -KeyContainer <key_container_guid> -CertificateFingerprint <certificate_fingerprint> -PackageOwners <package_owners> -V3ServiceIndexUrl <v3_service_index_url>

data.name: RepoSignCommandV3ServiceIndexUrlDescription
data.value: Repository V3 service index URL.

data.name: MSSignCommandInvalidCertificateFingerprint
data.value: Invalid value for 'CertificateFingerprint' option. The value must be a SHA-256, SHA-384, or SHA-512 certificate fingerprint (in hexadecimal).
